## API

### props

| props         | type     | required | default                                  | description            |
| ------------- | -------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| url           | `String` |          |                                          | raster source url      |
| tiles         | `Array`  |          |                                          | raster source tiles    |
| bounds        | `Array`  |          |                                          |                        |
| sourceMinzoom | `Number` |          |                                          |                        |
| sourceMaxzoom | `Number` |          |                                          |                        |
| tileSize      | `Number` |          |                                          |                        |
| scheme        | `String` |          |                                          |                        |
| attribution   | `String` |          |                                          |                        |
| sourceId      | `String` |          | `"mgl-raster-layer-${this._uid}-source"` | source Id              |
| metadata      | `Object` |          |                                          |                        |
| sourceLayer   | `String` |          |                                          | layer's `source-layer` |
| layerMinzoom  | `Number` |          |                                          |                        |
| layerMaxzoom  | `Number` |          |                                          |                        |
| filter        | `Array`  |          |                                          |                        |
| paint         | `Object` |          |                                          |                        |
| layout        | `Object` |          |                                          |                        |
| before        | `String` |          |                                          | layer order            |
| id            | `String` |          | `"mgl-raster-layer-${this._uid}"`        | layer id               |
